title: Meta faces EU ban on Facebook, Instagram targeted advertising
description: The European Data Protection Board has extended the temporary ban on targeted advertising on Facebook and Instagram, imposed by the Norwegian Data Protection Authority (DPA) in July. [...]

title: FSB arrests Russian hackers working for Ukrainian cyber forces
description: Russia's security agency published a press release on Tuesday saying that its officers detained two hackers who either assisted or joined Ukraine's hackers in cyber operations. [...]

title: Toronto Public Library outages caused by Black Basta ransomware attack
description: The Toronto Public Library is experiencing ongoing technical outages due to a Black Basta ransomware attack. [...]

title: New CVSS 4.0 vulnerability severity rating standard released
description: The Forum of Incident Response and Security Teams (FIRST) has officially released CVSS v4.0, the next generation of its Common Vulnerability Scoring System standard, eight years after CVSS v3.0, the previous major version. [...]

title: Hackers use Citrix Bleed flaw in attacks on govt networks worldwide
description: Threat actors are leveraging the 'Citrix Bleed' vulnerability, tracked as CVE-2023-4966, to target government, technical, and legal organizations in the Americas, Europe, Africa, and the Asia-Pacific region. [...]

title: 3,000 Apache ActiveMQ servers vulnerable to RCE attacks exposed online
description: Over three thousand internet-exposed Apache ActiveMQ servers are vulnerable to a recently disclosed critical remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability. [...]

title: Microsoft: Windows Copilot makes desktop icons jump between displays
description: Microsoft says a new known issue is causing desktop icons to behave erratically on systems with multiple displays when using the Windows Copilot AI-powered digital assistant. [...]

title: Mozi malware botnet goes dark after mysterious use of kill-switch
description: Mozi malware botnet activity faded away in August after a mysterious unknown party sent a payload on September 27, 2023, that triggered a kill switch to deactivate all bots. [...]

title: Hackers exploit recent F5 BIG-IP flaws in stealthy attacks
description: F5 is warning BIG-IP admins that devices are being breached by "skilled" hackers exploiting two recently disclosed vulnerabilities to erase signs of their access and achieve stealthy code execution. [...]

title: LayerX Enterprise Browser Security Extension – Secure the Modern Workspace
description: LayerX has developed a secure enterprise browser extension that delivers comprehensive visibility, monitoring, and granular policy enforcement on every event within a browsing session. Learn more about this cybersecurity platform from LayerxSecurity. [...]
